title: Update contact phone number and remove address from site

requirements.text: Update the site-wide phone number to “+91 77357 05356” wherever it is displayed and wherever click-to-call/WhatsApp links are used (Navbar CTAs, Home hero CTA, Contact/Booking page contact card, Footer contact info, and any other occurrences). Ensure phone links use a valid dial/WhatsApp format (e.g., tel:+917735705356 and https://wa.me/917735705356).

quotes: Change the phone number to +91 77357 05356, and remove adress

acceptanceCriteria: All user-visible phone text shows exactly “+91 77357 05356”.
WhatsApp booking button/link uses https://wa.me/917735705356 (with the existing prefilled message preserved).
No remaining instances of the old placeholder number (+1 (234) 567-890 / +1234567890 / 1234567890) exist in the frontend code or rendered UI.

requirements.text: Remove the salon address from the website UI wherever it appears (e.g., Footer contact info, Contact/Booking page address block, and any map placeholder captions that include an address). Do not show any address label/value after this change.

quotes: Change the phone number to +91 77357 05356, and remove adress

acceptanceCriteria: The Footer no longer displays an “Address:” line.
The Contact/Booking page no longer displays an address section/label/value.
Any text referencing a specific street address (e.g., “123 Style Street…”) is removed from the UI.
The Contact/Booking page still renders correctly without layout breakage after removing address content.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn components) or other frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Backend (Motoko) logic and state schema must remain unchanged for this request.
nonGoals: Changing the email address or opening hours.
Adding or integrating a real Google Maps embed or geolocation features.
Changing the booking form fields or backend appointment validation.
